summary: The story of the courtship of Joseph and Mary, and of the events leading up to the first Christmas.
cast: Madeleine Stowe|John Shea|Jane Wyatt|Paul Stewart|Audrey Totter|George Voskovec|Julie Garfield|Jamil Zakkai|Freddie Jones|John Rhys-Davies|William Morgan Sheppard|Kate O'Mara|Leo McKern|Geoffrey Beevers|Barrie Houghton|Jacob Witkin|Jack Lynn|Michael Balfour
title: La Natividad de Cristo
